description: Contents: Index to biblical passages (ff. 3r-18v). Moses Maimonides, Guide for the Perplexed (Moreh Nevukhim) (ff. 19r-301v). Shmuel Ibn Tibbon, Perush ha-milot ha-zarot sheba-Moreh nevukhim le-Rambam (ff. 303r-335r). Shmuel Ibn Tibbon, Perush ṭaʿame ha-mitsṿot (ff. 335r-337v).
title: Moreh Nevukhim with additional texts by Shmuel ibn Tibbon
author: Maimonides, Moses
